insure: You can fit the product before receiving it, and in the event that the product is invalid or does not match the description, you can return it with the delivery Agent and only pay the shipping cost
notSatisfied: If you are not satisfied with the product or if it does not meet the specifications, you can refuse to receive the product And return it with the representative, but we will pay the shipping cost
returnable: It is preferable to receive the order in person, to measure it, to confirm it, and to return it in case it does not agree with the specifications
turnBack: In the event that the product is received, we will not be able to send a representative to return it. You must come to the decision in Within 7 days from the date of receiving the order
shippingInNextPage: Shipping Will Be Calculated When You Complete The Order Shipping Details  , as The Shipping Fees ara a variable That Depends On Your Province
PHONE_NUMBER_MUST_BE_VALID: You should use A Valid Mobile Number
THIS_FIELD_IS_REQUIRED: You should not Leave This Field Empty
